text: Radhika Ambani (née Merchant) (born October 16, 1994) is an Indian businesswoman and philanthropist. She is known for her work in the healthcare industry and her involvement in various philanthropic activities. She is also associated with the Ambani family through her engagement to Anant Ambani, the youngest son of industrialist Mukesh Ambanihttps://www.hindustantimes.com/trending/nita-and-mukesh-ambani-take- front-row-seats-to-watch-chhoti-bahu-radhika-merchant-dance-at-friends- wedding-101729321239111.html and philanthropist Nita Ambani. == Early life and education == Merchant was born on December 18, 1994, in Mumbai, India. She completed her schooling at the Cathedral and John Connon School in Mumbai and later pursued a Bachelor’s degree in Political Science at New York University. She is the daughter of Viren Merchant, CEO of Encore Healthcare, and Shaila Viren Merchant. == References == Category:Living people Category:Indian businesspeople Category:1994 births
title: Radhika Merchant
